feed.title: Bausch / Jordan - Applied Neuroscience and Neurotechnologies
feed.subtitle: The Bausch / Jordan lab specializes in applied neuroscience and neurotechnology, pioneering in the exploration of fundamental brain functions such as memory and sleep in both epileptic patients and healthy individuals. Leveraging a multidimensional approach that includes intracranial recordings, surface EEGs, and custom-designed multimodal wearables, we aim to uncover novel insights into how internal states and external contexts affect epilepsy and memory.
